pokemons.name: Flareon
pokemons.description: The coziest of the bunch, able to burn all those who touch it.

pokemons.name: Vaporeon
pokemons.description: The silliest, and most moist baby.

pokemons.name: Espeon
pokemons.description: Able to feed itself using its telekenetic abilities.

pokemons.name: Umbreon
pokemons.description: The best doge born on the moon, and sent to us as god's gracious dark angel.

pokemons.name: Glaceon
pokemons.description: The coldest of little girls, and is able to freeze solid all that it touches.

pokemons.name: Sylveon
pokemons.description: It do got a giant bow though.
